title: The Call of the Wild (Part 6)
description: Buck and the exhausted team arrive back in Skaguay. Though they desperately need rest, they are immediately sold to a group of Americans. Hal, Charles, and Mercedes soon prove they know nothing of sleds, dogs, or life in the rugged north.
meta: Use the reading strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions, to understand a text
Analyze Plot : Analyze plot throughout a text
Hyphenated and Compound Words : Identify and use hyphenated compound adjectives
